text: First visit. Thorough skin examination and recommendations. Thank you.
I recommend 100%!
My 12-year-old son was examined with great care and consideration for his comfort. Skin lesions all over the body were thoroughly examined, including the oral mucosa and eye area.
Excellent Doctor - thorough, specific, helpful, and very engaged in every patient's problem. If such doctors were everywhere and always, life would be much simpler. I warmly recommend!
Everything was good. Professional doctor, nice office.
Very pleasant and substantive Doctor. She explained to me step by step how the treatment would look.
The Doctor conducted a detailed interview and explained the treatment prospects, leaving no doubts. Recommendations were clear and understandable. Highly recommend.
Very thorough and detailed interview which facilitates diagnosis. The Doctor is polite and meticulous. I recommend.
The first visit took place in a very pleasant atmosphere. The Doctor explained everything thoroughly. My son is just starting treatment, but I feel he is in good and professional hands.

The Doctor has a very good approach to children. I entered the office with my crying and stressed 3.5-year-old daughter. The doctor quickly calmed my daughter down, which allowed all the moles to be examined. Thank you!
The Doctor is very engaged and tries to find the source of the problem, not just treat it temporarily.
The doctor has a wonderful approach to children. The visit took place in a pleasant atmosphere and without any problems.

Quick, specific visit with detailed examination of the skin lesion. The doctor proposed a course of action considering my third trimester of pregnancy, explained everything and reassured me. Highly recommend
Anna is specific, provides all necessary information.
Very nice Lady, took good care of us, examined all the moles and explained everything to us very thoroughly. I recommend
I warmly recommend! The doctor is a very pleasant person and you can see she knows what she's doing. Wonderful approach to the patient.

The Doctor has a wonderful approach to children, the visit takes place in a friendly atmosphere. I received detailed instructions on the procedure, as well as detailed answers to questions. I recommend :)
I warmly recommend, the doctor is punctual and very professional.
Substantive, specific, covered several topics in one visit. The price is also good, cheaper than large facilities with subscriptions.

Unfortunately, it's not possible to give a higher rating to Dr. Anna Kowalska who very warmly received my 8-year-old, for which we sincerely thank her that there is someone with such a calling and heart, with an approach for the patient - we will visit more than once...
